articles.author: Steff Danielle Thomas
articles.title: Biden in Thanksgiving message calls for unity above politics: ‘Stop the rancor’ - The Hill
articles.description: President Biden called into the Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade on Thursday, calling on Americans to “come together” and put unity above politics over the holiday weekend — and beyond. “On this Thanksgiving, Al, we have to come together,” the president told NB…
